# `box_chars`

Box characters


## Description

Helper function to print unicode characters using escape codes.


## Usage

```r
box_chars()
is_latex_output()
is_utf8_output()
```


## Details

Much inspiration taken from fs  [tree.R](https://rdrr.io/cran/fs/src/R/tree.R)
